content: 32 36 16 20 24 28 12 16 20 24 sts the ssk slip 2 sts knitwise move both to left following section is worked flat within the next 32 38 needle and k2tog through back of loop 50 56 26 32 38 44 20 26 32 38 heel sts sl1 slip_stitch turn wyif with yarn in front m1l make one st left leaning row 1 rs k 21 25 33 37 17 21 25 29 13 17 21 m1r make one st right leaning 25 lli k1 turn lli use tip of the left needle to pick up the row 2 ws sl1wyif ds p 11 13 17 19 9 11 13 stitch two row below the first stitch on the 15 7 9 11 13 llip p1 turn right needle and then knit into it with the right needle to make a new stitch row 3 rs sl1wyif ds k to 2 sts before last duplicated llip use the tip of the left needle to pick up st lli k1 turn the stitch two row below the first stitch on row 4 ws sl1wyif ds p to 2 sts before last duplicated the right needle and then purl into it with st llip p1 turn the right needle to make a new stitch rs/ws right side/wrong side repeat row 3 & 4 another 2 3 5 6 1 2 3 4 0 1 2 st s stitch es 3 more times ds duplicate the stitch just slipped on the right needle by wrapping yarn over the for the final repeat of row 4 sl1wyif ds p5 llip needle on top of st if following st is a purl do not turn now working any duplicated sts as if just a this is a complete yo if following is a knit it single st p 6 8 12 14 4 6 8 10 2 4 6 8 p2tog is half a yo to the back turn bor beginning of round heel flap row a rs sl1 k1 9 11 15 17 7 9 11 repeat repeat 13 5 7 9 11 times sl1 ssk turn dn darning needle © 2021 galt house of yarn all rights reserved v1 1 www galthouseofyarn ca
